response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in how it can benefit you. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I'm offering it to you at a special price of $12,000.
